fields.label: SharpSpring Analytics Code
fields.name: sharpspring_analytics
fields.default_value:
<script type="text/javascript">
// Paste your SharpSpring Analytics JavaScript below

var _ss = _ss || []; 
_ss.push(['_setDomain', 'https://koi-3QNA3B8I86.marketingautomation.services/net']); 
_ss.push(['_setAccount', 'KOI-3UG4658L9E']); 
_ss.push(['_trackPageView']); (function() { 
	var ss = document.createElement('script'); 
	
	ss.type = 'text/javascript'; 
	
	ss.async = true;  
	
	ss.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'koi-3QNA3B8I86.marketingautomation.services/client/ss.js?ver=1.1.1'; 
	
	var scr = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; 
	
	scr.parentNode.insertBefore(ss, scr);
})();

// Paste your SharpSpring Analytics JavaScript above
</script>
fields.placeholder: Paste your SharpSpring analytics JavaScript code into this field.
